convertFiles

public void convertFiles(java.io.File directory)
Convertes convertable files from the list und saves these files in a directory. If there is given a Null for the directory, the Temp-directory of the system will be used.

Specified by:
convertFiles in interface IFileList
Parameters:
directory - - the directory
